wikipedia_page.main: John J. Hulme (6 February 1945 – 26 May 2008) was an English professional football player and manager.

response: *28 May 2008 – John Hulme, 63, former Bolton Wanderers, Reading and Bury defender.
*John Hulme, 63, English footballer (Bolton Wanderers, Reading, Bury).A professional on the pitch and a hero to his sons" – John Hulme
*John Hulme (Derbyshire cricketer) (1862–1940),  English cricketer who played for Derbyshire 1887–1903
*John Hulme (Shropshire cricketer) (born 1950), Welsh cricketer who played for Shropshire
*John Hulme (author) (born 1969), American children's writer and film director
